definition: pumpkin (Gymnopetalum chinense)/a mace with a brass head resembling a pumpkin
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Jinguashi, town in Ruifang District, New Taipei City, Taiwan, noted for its historic gold and copper mines, used as a prisoner-of-war camp by the Japanese (1942-1945)

sentences.english: I will have steamed spareribs cooked with pumpkin for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 今天中午我要喫金瓜蒸排骨。

sentences.english: These truly were Chinkuashi's golden days.
sentences.chinese: 那時真是金瓜石的黃金時期。

sentences.english: Jewelry shops and restaurants featuring Chinese and Japanese cuisine crowded the streets.
sentences.chinese: 珠店和中日風味的餐廳擠滿了金瓜石的街道。

definition: white flowered gourd or calabash (family Crescentia)
variant of 芥藍|芥蓝[gai4 lan2]
radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
